divs: Sighting DetailsI was testing a new keychain camcorder outside and came upon a fiery object or trail in the sky over Los Angeles. The camcorder has no viewfinder, so I am just pointing it towards the object. Some of the event goes out of frame because of this.
Summary: Saw a fiery object or trail in the sky over Los Angeles
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Diamond Bar
There were no other sightings in Diamond Bar on or around February 4th 2013
